articles.author: Joel Khalili
articles.title: The Science of Crypto Forensics Survives a Court Battle—for Now
articles.description: A jury convicted Roman Sterlingov of money laundering this month. His defense team says it will appeal, saying the crypto-tracing technique at the heart of the case is “pseudoscience.”
articles.content: On March 12, Russian-Swedish national Roman Sterlingov was found guilty of money laundering conspiracy and other violations by a federal jury in Washington, DC, for having operated Bitcoin Fog, a ser… [+3654 chars]
